'''Húrin II''' ([[Third Age]] {{TA|2515|n}}<ref>{{PM|Elendil}}, p. 205</ref> – {{TA|2628|n}},<ref name="South">{{App|South}}</ref> aged 113 years) was the fourteenth [[Ruling Steward]] of [[Gondor]].

==History==
Húrin ruled [[Gondor]] as its Steward for twenty-three years, and was succeeded by his son, [[Belecthor I]].<ref name="South"/>

==Etymology==
For the meaning of his name refer to [[Húrin of Emyn Arnen#Etymology|Húrin of Emyn Arnen - Etymology]]. Húrin II was probably named after the hero of the [[First Age]] [[Húrin|Húrin Thalion]], the [[Lord of Dor-lómin]].<ref>{{NM|P2v}}, footnote 3, p. 189</ref><ref>{{PM|Elendil}}, p. 203</ref>
